views.markdown:
Tweak for Pokemon Go

This tweak allows players to walk their character in-game with a joystick. Additionally, it also includes an IV cheker, as well as other features. Includes support for Go+ and Gotcha.

#### What's New

Here's what's new in PokeGo++ 2.0 (iOS 11+)!:

1. Updated to support official app 1.109.0/0.141.1
2. Please be aware that this is only a partial bypass but one good enough to play.
3. There are no more crashes with this bypass.
4. You will be limited to anywhere between 5 and 30 minutes of continuous play without interruption until you are required to restart the app.
5. We block the detection by displaying “Network Error” on the screen. You will also know if Pokémon stop spawning as well. All you need to do is simply close and reopen. You will not need to re-enter credentials. :)

[Global++ Knowledgebase](https://knowledge.globalplusplus.com)

1. Updated to support official app 1.109.0/0.141.1
2. Please be aware that this is only a partial bypass but one good enough to play.
3. There are no more crashes with this bypass.
4. You will be limited to anywhere between 5 and 30 minutes of continuous play without interruption until you are required to restart the app.
5. We block the detection by displaying “Network Error” on the screen. You will also know if Pokémon stop spawning as well. All you need to do is simply close and reopen. You will not need to re-enter credentials. :)

1. Updated to support official app 1.105.2/0.137.2
2. New Shinies and Possible Shiny icons
3. New Spinda and Giratina IV Filters
4. Map Loading Bug Fix
5. Fixed blank buttons
6. Some stability fixes for POST calls

1. Updated to support official app 1.105.2/0.137.2
2. Patreon Activation Fixes
3. Enabled Dark Mode on more screens
4. Added Pokemon Name translations for multiple languages
5. Bug Fixes
6. Added more IV Notifications includes research encounters
7. Added more icons and Map improvements
8. Radar 2.0 Pokemon Lists are now searchable
9. All Pokemon searches are case-insensitive

1. Updated to support official app 1.105.1/0.137.1
2. Added IVs to Map
3. Improved Scanner to include IVs
4. Pokemon icons now respect Possible shiny and forms
5. Added Lure Only filter to show pokestops
6. Pokemon Distances now detect your locale settings to determine which metric system to use KM vs. Miles etc.
7. Fixed iPad crashing issue when trying to share Raid/Gym coords from Map
8. Fixed iPad crashing issue when exporting/importing settings
9. Added new Possible Shiny icons
10. PokeGo++ has undergone a massive backend performance update.
We have reduced the tweak size from 15.6MB to 8MB!
We also changed a fundamental and old database protocol that was long overdue.
Map loading and overall stability should be improved.

1. Updated to support official app 1.101.1/0.133.1
2. Added support for iOS 12.1.3+
3. Added new shiny assets
4. Added Count to IV List
5. Improved IV List Search
6. Ditto Feed is now active
7. Fixed Ocean bug
8. Fixed Cooldown timer
9. Minor text fixes

1. Updated to support official app 1.101.0/0.133.0
2. Added Tier 2 donor features:
3. Extra coordinate lists: 8 slots
4. Exclusive Quest Feed and Generator
5. Exclusive Pokemon Feed and Generator
6. Exclusive Nest Feed and Generator
7. Exclusive Raids Feed and Generator
8. Exclusive Coords Bots to integrate with Discord and Notifications
9. Exclusive Favorites Feed
10. Exclusive 100 Feed
11. Activation for a second device simultaneously
